Meta.description: Autocraft recipes made of a single item type
Repair your stuff using Forge Energy

Meta.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft
Allows hovering over items in inventories while holding a Thaumometer to scan them.

Meta.credits: I'd like to thank Coro, Corosauce, and CordonFreeman for making this possible
Meta.description: Collection of systems and helper code for Corosus's mods
Spawns a Zombified Player when a player dies
Localized rain and storms that evolve into deadly tornadoes and others, also some ambience effects
a mod about using two keybinds for each hand.

Meta.credits: Developed by BlayTheNinth. Includes item icons by @JoeCreates released under CC-BY-SA 3.0
Meta.description: Teleport back to activated waystones. For Survival, Adventure or Servers.
A Nether expansion, exploration, and experience.

Meta.credits: Cyanobacterium (aka DrCyano) For starting the project & geologists everywhere. SeqSEE for helping with shields.
Meta.description: This mod adds historically common metals to Minecraft
Nether Metals is an Addon for the mod Base Metals, it expands it to bring its ores to the Nether dimension.
Does what it says on the tin.
Baubles capability for some Actually Additions gadgets!
Adds fairy lights and other decorations to Minecraft
Adds new mobs to enhance Minecraft!
Adds a few fish, to go along with the vanilla items!
Adds sleeping bags and hammocks for portability and daytime napping without setting a new spawn. Comes in 16 different colors!
The book of books.

BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!
Provides advanced and highly customizable world generation capabilities.
Stores your stuff in the END!

Meta.description: Trees, bees and more.
FTBUtilities

Meta.description: Magic themed bee expansion for Forestry. TC4, Botania, EE3, AM 2, TE 3 & more!
Reborn Core is a library used for many of the Tech Reborn team's mods, including Tech Reborn, Quantum Storage, Fluxed Redstone, Hardcore Map Reset, and many more.
Behold the Redstone (Flux) Revolution - provides Flux-Infused Tools and Armor!
The Redstone Flux API - the cornerstone of Energy Transfer in modded Minecraft since 1.6.4.

Meta.description: Redstone Flux jetpacks and more
Thermal gets Agrarian - provides options for farming and related activities!
Thermal gets Dynamic! Adds ducts - blocks for transporting Items, Fluids, Redstone Flux, and even Players!
The Foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!
Expanding Minecraft Thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!
TheOneProbe support for some mods.
